circle.title: MIZORAM - AIZAWL: Census 2011 Total Rural Households = 17,157. Census 2011 Households with toilets = 16,708. Census 2001 Total Rural Households = 14,002. Census 2001 Households with toilets = 12,985. Difference between Census 2011 Households with toilets and Census 2001 Households with toilets = 4.6%
